Classes/BTThreeDSecurePostalAddress.html.abstract: Optional. Zip code or equivalent is usually required for countries that have them. For a list of countries that do not have postal codes please refer to http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Postal_code

Classes/BTThreeDSecurePostalAddress.html.name: phoneNumber
Classes/BTThreeDSecurePostalAddress.html.abstract: Optional. The phone number associated with the address

Classes/BTThreeDSecureLookup.html#/c:obj.abstract: The unique 3DS identifier assigned by Braintree to track the 3DS call as it progresses.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureLookup.html#/c:obj.abstract: The URL which the customer will be redirected to for a 3DS Interface. In 3DS 1, there will always be an acsURL surfaced even if there isn’t a password challenge. In 3DS 2, the presense of an acsURL indicates there is a challenge as it would otherwise frictionlessly complete without an acsURL.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureLookup.html#/c:obj.name: termURL
Classes/BTThreeDSecureLookup.html#/c:obj.abstract: The termURL is the fully qualified URL that the customer will be redirected to once the authentication completes.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureLookup.html#/c:obj.name: threeDSecureVersion
Classes/BTThreeDSecureLookup.html#/c:obj.abstract: The full version string of the 3DS lookup result.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureLookup.html#/c:obj.name: transactionID
Classes/BTThreeDSecureLookup.html#/c:obj.abstract: This a secondary unique 3DS identifier assigned by Braintree to track the 3DS call as it progresses.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: preorderIndicator
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. The 2-digit number indicating whether the cardholder is placing an order with a future availability or release date

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: preorderDate
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. The 8-digit number (format: YYYYMMDD) indicating expected date that a pre-ordered purchase will be available

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: giftCardAmount
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. The purchase amount total for prepaid gift cards in major units

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: giftCardCurrencyCode
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. ISO 4217 currency code for the gift card purchased

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: giftCardCount
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. Total count of individual prepaid gift cards purchased

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: accountAgeIndicator
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. The 2-digit value representing the length of time cardholder has had account.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: accountCreateDate
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. The 8-digit number (format: YYYYMMDD) indicating the date the cardholder opened the account.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: accountChangeIndicator
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. The 2-digit value representing the length of time since the last change to the cardholder account. This includes shipping address, new payment account or new user added.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. The 8-digit number (format: YYYYMMDD) indicating the date the cardholder’s account was last changed. This includes changes to the billing or shipping address, new payment accounts or new users added.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: accountPwdChangeIndicator
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. The 2-digit value representing the length of time since the cardholder changed or reset the password on the account.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: accountPwdChangeDate
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. The 8-digit number (format: YYYYMMDD) indicating the date the cardholder last changed or reset password on account.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: shippingAddressUsageIndicator
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. The 2-digit value indicating when the shipping address used for transaction was first used.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: shippingAddressUsageDate
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. The 8-digit number (format: YYYYMMDD) indicating the date when the shipping address used for this transaction was first used.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: transactionCountDay

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: transactionCountYear
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. Number of transactions (successful or abandoned) for this cardholder account within the last year.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: addCardAttempts
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. Number of add card attempts in the last 24 hours.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: accountPurchases

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: fraudActivity

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: shippingNameIndicator
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. The 2-digit value indicating if the cardholder name on the account is identical to the shipping name used for the transaction.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: paymentAccountIndicator
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. The 2-digit value indicating the length of time that the payment account was enrolled in the merchant account.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: paymentAccountAge
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. The 8-digit number (format: YYYYMMDD) indicating the date the payment account was added to the cardholder account.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: addressMatch
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. The 1-character value (Y/N) indicating whether cardholder billing and shipping addresses match.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: accountID
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. Additional cardholder account information.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: ipAddress
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. The IP address of the consumer. IPv4 and IPv6 are supported.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: orderDescription
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. Brief description of items purchased.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: taxAmount
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. Unformatted tax amount without any decimalization (ie. $123.67 = 12367).

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: userAgent
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. The exact content of the HTTP user agent header.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: authenticationIndicator
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. The 2-digit number indicating the type of authentication request.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: installment
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. An integer value greater than 1 indicating the maximum number of permitted authorizations for installment payments.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: purchaseDate
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. The 14-digit number (format: YYYYMMDDHHMMSS) indicating the date in UTC of original purchase.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: recurringEnd
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. The 8-digit number (format: YYYYMMDD) indicating the date after which no further recurring authorizations should be performed.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: recurringFrequency
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. Integer value indicating the minimum number of days between recurring authorizations. A frequency of monthly is indicated by the value 28. Multiple of 28 days will be used to indicate months (ex. 6 months = 168).

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: sdkMaxTimeout
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. The 2-digit number of minutes (minimum 05) to set the maximum amount of time for all 3DS 2.0 messages to be communicated between all components.

Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.name: workPhoneNumber
Classes/BTThreeDSecureAdditionalInformat.abstract: Optional. The work phone number used for verification. Only numbers; remove dashes, parenthesis and other characters.
